text: Netscape Navigator (or just Netscape) was a closed source web browser between 1994 to 1998. In 1999, they made it open source. It was first released in 1994. It was very popular during the 1990s until Internet Explorer gained more market share due to Microsoft bundling Internet Explorer with Windows 98. Netscape Communications Navigator Version 0.9B (Mosaic Netscape Navigator 0.9b) was released June 13, 1994 (at dejavu.org/1994win.htm ). It was no longer supported on 1 March 2008. == Versions == The last version of Netscape Navigator was version 9.0. == References == == Other websites == * browser.netscape.com * Netscape Navigator -Citizendium Category:Web browsers
title: Netscape Navigator
